snippet: Some of the 130 were immediately released and others received reduced prison terms, the Iran Daily quoted Tehran’s chief prosecutor as saying.
lead_paragraph: Some of the 130 were immediately released and others received reduced prison terms, the Iran Daily quoted Tehran’s chief prosecutor as saying.

headline.main: Iran: Amnesty Granted to 130 Prisoners Arrested After 2009 Election
headline.print_headline: Iran: Amnesty Granted to 130 Prisoners Arrested After 2009 Election
